title: Having a connection problem
body:
I assume others have had this, wondering if anyone knows what to do to fix it? 
I'm sitting 2 meters away from my router, 5 bars & the rest of my internet is working fine but it won't let me connect to the loading screen. I have no new anti-virus software and the one I do have I'm pretty sure doesn't have anything League-related blocked or identified as a threat. I've tried hitting reconnect, tried shutting off the program and then re-opening to reconnect and I've tried restarting the laptop and trying to reconnect again, none of those worked.
